scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.e2e:start: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.e2e:start:logs: concurrently "bash -lc "npm --prefix backend run dev > backend.log 2>&1"" "bash -lc "npm --prefix frontend run dev > frontend.log 2>&1""
